content: this pattern will show you how to crochet the iconic bing bong from the video game peak this pattern is perfect if you want to have a cute plushie of bing bong or to make it as a gift for a loved one you re playing the game with this 18 pages pdf includes graphs written instructions and pictures to guide you in crocheting and assembling bing bong written in english with us terms size approximately 25 x 20 cm stitches chains single_crochet increases decreases magic_ring material 4 mm hook - acrylic yarn light/medium weight - stuffing - scissors - tapestry needle difficulty intermediate/advanced for personal use only don t post the pattern or use it to sell commercial pieces
